data.title: Template:Ja
data.text:
This template returns a hex code for the colors of Japanese rail services and rapid transit lines.

In order to call a line's color, the code {{Ja-rail-color|service}} is used (where service is replaced by the appropriate abbreviation for the service or line.

Adding # as the optional second parameter will suppress the normally-included preceding # symbol (required for some templates).

After saving an amendment, to refresh the color samples.

Usage

Valid parameters

Operator Parameter Color

Line

JR Central CF #327198 Chūō Main Line CB #477543 Gotemba Line CD #6FA3D7 Iida Line CJ #16B68F Kansai Main Line CC #773C97 Minobu Line CI #C8BA45 Taita Line CG #9E1813 Takayama Main Line CE #8C5A38 Taketoyo Line CA #F6861F Tōkaidō Main Line JR East JC #FF4500 Chūō Main Line JB #FFD700 Chūō–Sōbu Line JE #DC143C Keiyō Line JJ #3CB371 Jōban Line JL #808080 Jōban Line (local) JK #00BFFF JU #FFA500 Utsunomiya Line JY #9ACD32 Yamanote Line JO #0070B9 Yokosuka Line JR Hokkaido HA #E09C42 Sapporo—Asahikawa—Abashiri HAP #0098D8 Chitose Line (Airport Branch) HB #EB848D [[|]] HH #487CBC #2683CE Odawara Line OH|H #E8532E Hakone Tozan Line OT #2683CE Tama Line Osaka Metro MC #019A66 Chūō Line (Osaka) MI #EE7B1A Imazatosuji Line MM #E5171F Midōsuji Line MN #A9CC51 Nagahori Fukutoshin Line G #FF9500 Ginza Line Z #8F76D6 Hanzōmon Line H #B5B5AC Hibiya Line M and Mb #F62E36 Marunouchi Line N #00AC9B Namboku Line T #009BBF Tozai Line Y #C1A470 Yūrakuchō Line Tokyu SR #008459 Shibayama Railway SL #FF69B4 Shin-Keisei Line MO #000080 Tokyo Monorail TR #0AAA3C Tōyō Rapid Railway Line U #0065A6 Yurikamome WK #6D0023 Watarase Keikoku Line Operator Parameter Color

Line

Examples

Code Result {{color|{{Ja-rail-color|A}}|■}} Toei Asakusa Line ■ Toei Asakusa Line {{RouteBox|Narita Sky Access Line|Keisei Narita Airport Line|{{Ja-rail-color|KS|N}}|black}} Narita Sky Access Line {{JARC|Z}} #8F76D6 {{JARC|Z|#}} 8F76D6
